question:
You have received a letter from your bank, asking you to acknowledge receipt of a new bank card. However, the card was missing from the envelope.
Write a letter to the bank's head office. In your letter:
•	explain why you are writing
•	express concern about the missing card
•	ask them what they intend to do
text: Hope my letter finds you well.

I am Marites Acantilado, I am one of your customers in the Downtown branch. Please be informed that I am writing this letter with regard to  my new bank card. I cannot find it inside the envelope. I recently received it yesterday.
Thus, I believe I lost it or maybe your staff forgot to put it inside the envelope. My big concern is what if I lost it in public areas such as malls. Then, someone use it without me knowing.

I would like to ask if you could double-check it with your staff. If still no progress, I would like to request if you could block it. I appreciated it if you could inform me as soon as possible. I really need to know what happens so that I can avoid this kind of incident in the future.
Should you have any concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me on my mobile number. Looking forward to hearing from you.
